lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
The teacher asks for a volunteer from the class to help an Italian exchange student, Gino, learn to speak English. You can:
Wouldn't it be great if Gino were this incredible-looking, sexy, wild and uninhibited Italian fox?  It would be, but as it turns out, Gino is rather ordinary-looking. Do you:
#STOP HELPING HIM AFTER A SHORT PERIOD OF TIME
You're behaving kind of selfishly, don't you think? Haven't you ever heard of being nice, just for the sake of being nice?
As it turns out, Gino has a really great personality. He becomes a good friend.
I guess you believe that you're too busy right now.
